name: Scott Morrisons Fantasy Firefighting Arcade Adventure
name_original: Scott Morrisons Fantasy Firefighting Arcade Adventure
description:
This is a parody and a protest.

It has bugs but I'm going on holiday for a few weeks in tribute to the PM. 

Art done by Macauley Bell-Maier.
Sounds made with LabChirp.
Music can be found here opengameart.org/content/fire-level
The pixel explosions came from here: opengameart.org/content/explosions-2
Fonts labelled as "Architext" and "Painty Paint" from 1001fonts.com
